alert.note: Alert for Essex; Morris; Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 6:00AM EDT until April 13 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Jersey... Passaic River At Pine Brook affecting Morris, Essex, and Passaic Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Passaic River At Pine Brook. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, street flooding occurs in Fairfield including Camp Lane Road. Two Bridges Road is closed going into Lincoln Park and Wayne. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 19.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage before noon. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (8 am) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Stg Time Date Passaic River Pine Brook 19.0 19.1 Wed 5 a 18.5 18.1 Crested &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued by 1200 PM EDT.
